name: PEPE Community
short_description: Pepe Community is a community-driven, fair-launched DeFi project built on Binance Smart Chain #BSC.
description: No Whale can own > 0.5% supply. Auto-farming: earn $BNB, $BUSD, $BTC, $XBN. Auto-staking: earn $PEPE with zero fee. No auto-staking for holders who own >= 0.25% supply. Fair launch: No pre-sales, no Dev Fund. Super SAFE: Liquidity is Burned.
